title: Did your love reach!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Ai-san, thank you very much-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oh, that face says that it went well huh~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah! Yesterday I said, “Thank you for everything”, while handing it to onee-chan! She gladly accepted the love filled chocolate that I made with Ai-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai guesses it was worthwhile doing your best despite being burned~....though, is there any mark left? Are you okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It was just a little burn, so I think I’m fine. Ai-san, are you the type that gets worried a lot?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai-san loves Ruby, so of course I’ll be worried!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe….Ruby loves you too Ai-san♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
